alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Greeley; Logan; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 17 at 4:09PM CDT until June 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ..Scattered thunderstorms will develop in northeast Colorado this afternoon and move into the remainder of the area this evening. Due to heavy rainfall last night, areas along and south of Interstate 70 will be susceptible to additional flooding as these storms move through. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT... The Flood Watch continues for * Portions of northwest Kansas and west central Kansas, including the following areas, in northwest Kansas, Graham, Sheridan, Sherman, and Thomas. In west central Kansas, Gove, Greeley, Logan, Wallace, and Wichita. * Until midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight * WHEN...From this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Gove; Graham; Greeley; Logan; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
